str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
A hearer of, a listener to. From akroaomai; a hearer.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.
(a) a maker, poet, (b) a doer, carrier out, performer. From poieo; a performer; specially, a 'poet'.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To be like, resemble. Apparently a primary verb; to resemble.
A male human being; a man, husband. A primary word; a man.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Dative Masculine Singular
str2: To take note of, perceive, consider carefully, discern, detect, make account of. From kata and noieo; to observe fully.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From pros and ops; the front, i.e. The countenance, aspect, appearance, surface; by implication, presence, person.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
A mirror, looking-glass (made of highly polished metal). From eis and a presumed derivative of optanomai; a mirror.
